${ModID}:TodoItem.NAME: test Starting Relic
${ModID}:TodoItem.FLAVOR: It'll do for now I guess

${ModID}:SynthesisRecipe.NAME: Synthesis Recipe
${ModID}:SynthesisRecipe.FLAVOR: You're lucky the Moogles and the Merchant are such good friends.
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards on sale can be bought for free #b3 times.

${ModID}:ProofOfConnection.NAME: Proof Of Connection
${ModID}:ProofOfConnection.FLAVOR: Proof of winning the battle in the portal at Disney Castle. Perhaps it has changed Sora.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, choose #b1 of #b3 random upgraded cards of any color and add the chosen card into your hand. NL It costs 0 the rest of this combat.

${ModID}:PiggyBank.NAME: Piggy Bank
${ModID}:PiggyBank.FLAVOR: A fine investment in your future.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have #yDrive #yPoints at the end of combat, bank up to #b6. Gain stored #yDrive #yPoints at the beginning of the next combat.
